name: Whiskers
short_description: Whiskers is a friendly and curious cat who loves to explore and cuddle. She is very affectionate and playful.

name: Polly
short_description: Polly is a vibrant parrot known for her colorful feathers and ability to mimic human speech. She enjoys social interaction..

name: Buddy
short_description: Buddy is a loyal and energetic dog who loves outdoor adventures. He is great with kids and very protective.

name: Goldie
short_description: Goldie is a calm and beautiful goldfish, known for her vibrant scales and graceful swimming. She brings tranquility to any home.

name: Nibbles
short_description: Nibbles is a playful and curious hamster who loves to explore his surroundings. He is small, fluffy, and very active.

name: Thumper
short_description: Thumper is a gentle and soft rabbit who enjoys being petted. He is calm, friendly, and loves to hop around the garden.
